sentences.en: "You're coming?" he said excitedly. "That's fantastic! That's incredible!"
sentences.cn: “你要来么？”他激动地说，“那太好了！简直难以置信！”

sentences.en: fantastic tales of dragons and fairy queens
For some inexplicable reason he gave up a fantastic job.
sentences.cn: 由于某种莫名其妙的原因，他放弃了一份很不错的工作。

sentences.en: Have you heard his new opera? It is fantastic.
sentences.cn: 你听过他的新歌剧 吗 ?那好极了.

sentences.en: He's been fantastic. I owe him a lot.
sentences.cn: 他真是个大好人，我欠他太多了。

sentences.en: He's going to be a fantastic player if he keeps away from booze and women.
sentences.cn: 如果能不近酒色，他将成为一名出色的运动员。

sentences.en: I got a fantastic new job and my salary tripled.
sentences.cn: 我得到了一份非常好的新工作，薪水涨到了原来的3倍。

sentences.en: I'm lost for words — it's fantastic.
Isn't it fantastic? Just look at that!
sentences.cn: 这是不是棒极了？看看那个！

sentences.en: It suddenly clicked that this was fantastic fun.
sentences.cn: 我突然意识到，这真是太有趣了。

sentences.en: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.cn: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

sentences.en: My mother, who had a sheltered upbringing, has fantastic memories of childhood.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈在呵护下长大，对童年有着非常美好的回忆。

sentences.en: That's fantastic . He's vanished in the twinkling of an eye.
sentences.cn: 他怎么一转眼就不见了, 真见鬼.

sentences.en: What he said is really an unheard - of fantastic story.

words.tran_cn: 想像中地；奇特地；难以置信地
幻想家；梦想家；脾气古怪的人
耽于幻想；奏幻想曲（等于phantasy）

trans.tran_cn: 极好的，极大的，奇异的，不切实际的
